description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' using Google Mock for unit testing. The mock class inherits from multiple interfaces within the WPEFramework namespace, representing a service in the testing environment with various method stubs for testing different functionalities.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework service interfaces for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a certain feature is supported based on a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns subsystems associated with the service.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a number and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two string parameters.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface based on callsign.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs substitution with a string parameter.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason parameter.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason parameter.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for certain states.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns configuration line for a given string.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Puts the service into hibernate mode.

methods.name: RemoteConnection
methods.description: Returns a remote connection object based on ID.

methods.name: Instantiate
methods.description: Creates an instance of an RPC object.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Retrieves library search paths based on a string parameter.
